patches.content:
Index: 
===================================================================
--- 
+++ 
@@ -0,0 +1,33 @@
+{
+  "compilerOptions": {
+    "target": "esnext",
+    "module": "esnext",
+    "lib": [
+      "dom",
+      "esnext"
+    ],
+    "allowJs": true,
+    "skipLibCheck": true,
+    "esModuleInterop": true,
+    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
+    "strict": true,
+    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
+    "noEmit": true,
+    "isolatedModules": true,
+"moduleResolution": "nodenext",
+    "resolveJsonModule": true,
+    "jsx": "react-native",
+    "paths": {
+      "@/*": [
+        "./*"
+      ]
+    }
+  },
+  "include": [
+    "**/*.ts",
+    "**/*.tsx",
+    ".expo/types/**/*.ts",
+    "expo-env.d.ts"
+  ],
+  "extends": "expo/tsconfig.base"
+}

commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "esnext",
    "module": "esnext",
    "lib": ["dom", "esnext"],
    "allowJs": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
    "strict": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "noEmit": true,
    "isolatedModules": true,
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "jsx": "react-native",
    "paths": {
      "@/*": ["./*"]
    }
  },
  "include": ["**/*.ts", "**/*.tsx"]
}
